name: Peanut Putter VR Mini Golf
description:
Design mini gold courses using building blocks. OR jump into playing other player's courses and try to beat the best scores.  

Players start in the clubhouse where they can interact with a touch screen tv. This is where they select to play or build courses. The list of available blocks and props will be expanded in future builds. Players use the grip button to call the build pallet closer and the trigger to select. Once a course is designed and the player finished it them self, they can then go ahead and publish it. 

The club house also gives the player a way to select the correct length putter, audio volume and graphics quality settings.

Courses can be selected using different filters. Players can be notified if their best scored is beaten if they select to enter their email address (optional)

Once again the grip is used to call the score card, that also allows the player to return the club house.

This was built using the HTC vive and Unity and is under current development.
